pilot.title: 2018 Pilot Preschools
content: The following preschools have been selected for the 2018 ELSA Pilot.

Thank you to everyone who expressed an interest in the 2018 ELSA Pilot. We received 888 expressions of interest from preschools, kindergartens and early learning centres across Australia. The 100 preschools in the 2018 ELSA Pilot have been selected to reflect preschool diversity around the country.
Participating educators will start their ELSA journey in Term 4 2017 with a face-to-face workshop about STEM in early learning. The ELSA Pilot will start in preschools in Term 1 2018.
To stay updated with the latest news about ELSA and resources about STEM in early learning, please sign up to our newsletter.
If you have any questions, please contact us at [team@elsa.edu.au](mailto:team@elsa.edu.au)
